title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. VI, subch. A, pt. 607 - Underground Telephone Construction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. VI, subch. A, pt. 607 - Underground Telephone Construction

State Regulations
§ 607.1 - Definitions
§ 607.2 - Clearance requirements of new subsurface telephone facilities from gas and liquid petroleum pipelines
§ 607.3 - Clearance requirements of subsurface telephone facilities constructed to replace existing facilities
§ 607.4 - Standards and practices applicable to the construction and environmental management of subsurface telephone facilities

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. VI, subch. A, pt. 607

Statutory authority: Public Service Law, §§
91[1], 94[2]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
